LanguageData.AdrenalineJunkie.degreeDatas.adrenaline_: {PAWN_nameDef} lives for the thrill of the action. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a rush from the adrenaline that flows throughout {PAWN_possessive} veins.
LanguageData.CoolHeaded.degreeDatas.coolheaded.label: cool-headed
LanguageData.CoolHeaded.degreeDatas.coolheaded.descri: {PAWN_nameDef} tends to keep calm in heated situations and generally doesn't get an adrenaline rush from them.
